resources.string: Do You Know Order of Operations?
1. Select all true statements about order of operations:
Multiplication has order precedence over division
Exponents (i.e. powers and square roots) has order precedence over multiplication
Addition and Subtraction are solved as they are encountered from left to right
If there are multiple grouping symbols, solve the outermost first
3. Following order of operation rules, which step comes first: \n 48÷3 + 2[12×3 - |7 - 16|]
Order of Operations Quiz Results for %s
